name: 1UP
description:
Find all the “1UP Extra Lives” in each level which can be exchanged for currency to escape the level!

Style: 2.5D platformer.

Made using: UNITY 2018.3.8 - code and level design. Fruity Loops - music and sound effects Photoshop - character art and UI

Controls: A / Left Arrow: Walk Left D / Right Arrow: Walk Right Space: Jump
